snippet.title: Mysterium (Digital Game) - English Long Trailer
snippet.description:
Discover the official adaptation of Mysterium, the famous As d'Or - 2016 Game of the Year, on smartphones, tablets and PC! Travel back to the 1920s and uncover the mystery surrounding a suspicious death in Warwick Manor. Interpret visions sent by the victim’s ghost and attempt to close the investigation - or embody the ghost and communicate with the mediums through abstract images. Play solo or cooperate with other mediums via an online chat system in multiplayer mode!

Download Mysterium on Android, iOS and Steam:
• Android: https://goo.gl/Cz9HvD
• iOS: http://apple.co/2iV4eYU
• Steam: https://goo.gl/YJAE3w

Follow us on social medias!
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AsmodeeDigital
• Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/AsmodeeDigital
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/asmodeedigital
